tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_generated_content (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ar_learning_content (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    content_type TEXT,
    content_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE notes (
    note_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    note_title VARCHAR(255),
    note_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE Notes (
  note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  title TEXT,
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  app_id UUID,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  interaction_datetime TIMESTAMP
);
